title: Patrick James Doyles New Book The Land of Mist and Mountain is a Creatively Crafted and Vividly Illustrated Journey into the Imagination and the Human Psyche.
text:
Recent release “The Land of Mist and Mountain” from Page Publishing author Patrick James Doyle is both suspenseful and perplex; this work is a page-turner that keeps the reader intrigued.
(PRWEB) October 12, 2015
Patrick James Doyle, a husband, father, English and history buff, musician, storyteller, devoted writer and author from Winters, California, has completed his first book “The Land of Mist and Mountain”: the first book to a trilogy of books about faith and humanity.
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Patrick James Doyle’s profound tale portrays the beauty of life and self-worth.
The union of the circle is a story about a troubled small town teen named Jonathan, who is dealing with the loss of his mother. He finds himself under the parental guidance of an abusive stepfather and older brother. Jonathan engages in drug use and constant fighting in school, which soon escalades out of control. He escapes the complexities of his life by imagining and drawing a distant world known only as “The Land of Mist and Mountain.” Jonathan soon has a falling out with his friends and losses another in a fatal car accident. He soon spirals downward as a series of events provoke him into the thought of suicide. During his attempt, Jonathan transports across the cosmos and finds himself in the “Land of Mist and Mountain.” A prophecy spoke of Jonathan’s arrival over a thousand years prior and Korum, a sinister overlord searched for him. Korum plans to destroy the young man and control the world.
With a host of characters, Jonathan will learn about an ancient foretelling and eventually realize he is in his own imagining. He must confront the dark lord and bring balance back to the world. Only by securing an army can he unite the distant lands under a single banner. He must overcome the evil by conquering formidable opponents and uniting a new circle of friends. Will he take his rightful place in bringing a morality back and restore the world, or will the evil Korum and his sadistic minions find him first? Join in the great journey, which will span oceans and continents alike as Jonathan finds out the truth of who he is.
Readers who wish to experience this inspiring work can purchase “The Land of Mist and Mountain” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
